SEARCH
Package ObjectUI

Class PatientUI

java.lang.Object
ObjectUI.PatientUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseUI
public class PatientUI extends Object implements BaseUI
The PatientUI class provides a command-line user interface for patients to manage personal information, appointments, and medical records. It interacts with a Patient instance to perform various patient-related operations.

This class allows patients to:

  • View medical records and update personal information
  • Schedule, reschedule, and cancel appointments
  • View available appointment slots, scheduled appointments and outcomes of past appointments

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientUI

      public PatientUI(Patient patient)
      Constructs a PatientUI instance for the specified Patient. It presents a menu that allows the patient to perform various operations relating to their medical records and appointments.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient for whom the UI is created

  • Method Details

    • updateContact

      public void updateContact(Patient patient)
      Allows the patient to update their contact information, including email address and contact number, based on their selection from a provided menu.
      Parameters:
      patient - the current Patient

    • viewAvailableAppointments

      public void viewAvailableAppointments()
      Displays available appointment slots for the patient based on the availability of doctors. Allows the patient to select a day and time slot, checking which doctors are available. If no doctors are available, the method terminates.

    • scheduleApt

      public Appointment scheduleApt(Patient patient)
      Schedules a new appointment for the patient.

      First asks patient to choose an available time slot. Then checks for any existing pending or ongoing appointments at the chosen slot, and if the slot is available, allows the patient to select a doctor and book the appointment. If this process succeeds, appointment is added into the database.

      Parameters:
      patient - the current Patient
      Returns:
      Appointment to be scheduled

    • rescheduleApt

      public void rescheduleApt(Patient patient)
      Reschedules an existing appointment for a patient.

      First checks if the patient has any ongoing or pending appointments. If no appointments are available, the method terminates. If appointments are available, it prompts the user to select an appointment to cancel via cancelApt(Patient). After successfully canceling the existing appointment, it prompts the user to schedule a new appointment via scheduleApt(Patient). If either the cancellation or new scheduling process is canceled or fails, the method terminates. If both processes succeed, the appointment is rescheduled in the database.

      Parameters:
      patient - the current Patient

    • cancelApt

      public Appointment cancelApt(Patient patient)
      Reschedules an existing appointment for a patient.

      First checks if the patient has any ongoing or pending appointments. If no appointment is available, the method terminates. Cancels an existing appointment by displaying the patient's ongoing and pending appointments, allowing them to choose which to cancel. The patient is prompted to confirm the cancellation before proceeding. If there are no existing appointments, the method terminates.

      Parameters:
      patient - the current Patient
      Returns:
      Appointment to be cancelled
